decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive strategies with a low mana curve and a high density of cheap creatures and spells. The goal is to quickly develop a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats. The commander, Flubs, the Fool, accelerates the deck's game plan by providing card advantage and flexibility. The deck includes a variety of mana dorks, cheap spells, and efficient creatures to maintain pressure on the opponent. With a mix of card draw, ramp, and disruption, the deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent to secure a swift victory. Additionally, the deck includes key combo pieces and powerful synergies to create explosive turns and close out games efficiently.

This deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures and disruptive spells to apply pressure on the opponent and control the game. Aragorn, King of Gondor serves as the commander, leading the aggro strategy with his ability to generate card advantage and provide a powerful anthem effect. The deck includes a mix of cheap removal spells, counterspells, and card draw to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a strong board presence. With a combination of aggressive creatures like True-Name Nemesis and powerful spells like Force of Will, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly while maintaining control of the game through disruption and tempo plays.

The main concept of the deck is to utilize the aggro strategy with Malcolm, the Eyes as the commander. The deck includes a mix of aggressive creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler, Dreadhorde Arcanist, and True-Name Nemesis, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Galvanic Blast to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Spells like Command Tower, Force of Will, and Counterspell help maintain control and protect against threats. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation spells such as Brainstorm, Ponder, and Preordain to ensure consistency and find key cards. Overall, the goal is to deploy threats quickly, disrupt the opponent's game plan, and close out the game before they can stabilize.

This deck is focused on playing aggressively and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent with speed and power. By utilizing the Partner commanders Rograkh, Son of Rohgahh and Tevesh Szat, Doom of Fools, the deck aims to quickly establish board presence and deal damage early on. The deck includes a variety of low-cost spells and creatures to generate mana quickly, disrupt the opponent's strategy with discard effects, and search for key combo pieces. With cards like Doomsday, Necropotence, and Yawgmoth's Will, the deck has the potential to combo off and win the game in a single turn. Overall, the deck is designed to be proactive and high-risk, high-reward in its gameplay approach.

The deck focuses on utilizing Aminatou, the Fateshifter's abilities to control the game through various means such as reanimation, hand disruption, and powerful creatures. The deck includes a mixture of removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Fatal Push, along with counterspells like Force of Will and Force Spike to disrupt opponents' game plans. It also includes powerful reanimation spells like Animate Dead and Unburial Rites to bring back key creatures like Griselbrand and Ashen Rider. The deck aims to control the board while setting up powerful combos with cards like Dance of the Dead and Corpse Dance to secure victory in a 1 vs 1 duel.

The Flamewar, Brash Veteran deck focuses on aggressive and disruptive gameplay, aiming to pressure the opponent quickly while disrupting their game plan. The deck includes a mix of efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Fatal Push, alongside disruptive cards such as Thoughtseize and Hymn to Tourach. Additionally, the deck utilizes powerful threats like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Seasoned Pyromancer to apply pressure and generate card advantage. The inclusion of cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon also disrupts opponents' mana bases, further increasing the deck's chances of victory through early aggression and disruption.

This aggressive deck focuses on utilizing Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel as the commander to generate treasure tokens and disrupt the opponent's game plan with a variety of counterspells and tempo plays. The main goal is to control the board with a mix of disruptive spells like Force of Will and Mana Leak while also applying pressure with evasive creatures like Delver of Secrets and True-Name Nemesis. The deck aims to out-tempo the opponent by efficiently countering threats and developing its board presence. Additionally, it includes card advantage engines like Kiora, the Rising Tide and Mystic Confluence to maintain hand advantage and ensure that it can constantly apply pressure on the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the aggressive strategy of Aggro archetype with Fury','','');">Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury as the Commander. The deck includes a mix of aggressive creatures, removal spells, and support cards to apply early pressure on the opponent and maintain board control. Key cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah, Chandra, Torch of Defiance, and Seasoned Pyromancer provide additional firepower, while cards like Swords to Plowshares and Path to Exile help deal with threats efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Tithe','','');">Mana Tithe and Pyroblast allow for disruption and protection, ensuring the deck can stay ahead and close out the game quickly.

The key concept of this deck is to use Aragorn, King of Gondor as the commander in a Duel Commander 1 vs 1 format to create an aggressive strategy. The deck focuses on utilizing a mix of efficient creatures, control spells, and powerful lands to maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a combination of strong removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt, alongside counterspells such as Force of Will and Mana Leak, the deck aims to control the battlefield while attacking with evasive threats like Mantis Rider and True-Name Nemesis. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Brazen Borrower and Snapcaster Mage to stay ahead in card advantage and maintain pressure on the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of aggression and control elements, utilizing Aragorn's abilities to push through for victory.

The deck revolves around using a mix of aggressive creatures, control spells, and disruptive abilities to control the game and pressure the opponent. Aragorn, King of Gondor, serves as the commander and provides a powerful threat on the battlefield. The deck includes a variety of instant spells like Lightning Bolt and Swords to Plowshares to deal with threats while efficient creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Brazen Borrower keep up the pressure. Additionally, cards like Force of Will and Mana Leak provide counterplay against opponent's key spells. The goal is to maintain board control, disrupt the opponent's game plan, and close out the game quickly with powerful creatures and burn spells.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and tempo control using the versatile abilities of Malcolm, the Eyes. By combining efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast with disruptive cards like Force of Will and Hullbreacher, the deck aims to keep the opponent on the back foot while building up its own board presence. With card draw and filtering options provided by cards like Brainstorm and Ponder, the deck seeks to maintain a consistent stream of threats and answers. Overall, the key strategy is to exert early pressure, disrupt the opponent's game plan, and maintain control of the pace of the game to come out on top in one-on-one duels.

This deck focuses on building a strong board presence quickly by utilizing the synergy between the commanders Ravos, Soultender and Thrasios, Triton Hero. The deck includes a variety of efficient creatures and spells to put pressure on the opponent and disrupt their game plan. With access to a suite of removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Abrupt Decay, as well as versatile tutors like Demonic Tutor and Green Sun's Zenith, the deck can answer threats and find key combo pieces efficiently. The mana base is carefully crafted to support the deck's color requirements and enable explosive starts. By leveraging the partner commanders' abilities and utilizing powerful synergy cards like Birthing Pod and Survival of the Fittest, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its aggressive strategy.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and powerful combat-oriented spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The commanders, Bruse Tarl and Yoshimaru, provide a strong aggressive presence and the ability to work together effectively. The main deck includes a mix of efficient creatures, removal spells such as Lightning Bolt and Swords to Plowshares, and powerful equipment like Embercleave and Skullclamp. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon to disrupt opponent's mana bases. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, with a mix of fetch lands and dual lands. Overall, the deck aims to aggressively pressure the opponent and win through combat damage.
